#summary How to contact the developers of Sequel Pro
#labels Featured

The best person to contact for questions/comments about Sequel Pro is Abhi Beckert. You can reach him via http://abhibeckert.com/contact.

If you have feature requests or bug reports you can also contact Abhi, but it's preferable to add tickets to the [http://code.google.com/p/sequel-pro/issues/list Issues Tracker].
